mapper.update: insert into user (user_id, email, password, user_name, origin_profile_img, access_token, refresh_token, stored_file_name,login_type, created_date) values (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{access_Token}, #{refresh_Token},#{stored_file_name}, 'L2', NOW())
insert into user_role (user_index, role_index) select u.index, r.index from user u join role r on r.name = 'ROLE_USER' where u.user_id = #{id}

UPDATE user SET password = #{password}, user_name = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, origin_profile_img = #{profileImage}, access_token = #{access_Token}, refresh_token = #{refresh_Token}, created_date = NOW() WHERE email=#{email}
